title: Junior Security Engineer
description: Join our security team as a Junior Security Engineer. This is an excellent opportunity for recent graduates or early-career professionals passionate about cybersecurity. You'll work alongside senior engineers to protect our infrastructure and learn cutting-edge security practices.
responsibilities: Assist in monitoring security systems and responding to alerts
Help maintain and update security documentation
Participate in security testing and code reviews
Support incident response activities under guidance
Learn and implement security best practices
Assist with security tool configuration and maintenance
Document security incidents and lessons learned
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field (or equivalent experience)
0-2 years of experience in IT or cybersecurity
Basic understanding of networking concepts (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP)
Knowledge of common security vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10)
